summary.span: 表示快顯功能表，可讓控制項公開控制項內容的特定功能。

span.span: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 屬性類別用來定義的位置和行為。The properties of the class are used to define the position and behavior of the . A或是可以有。A or can have a . 如果您指派來或是屬性，類別會處理以回應使用者互動的內容功能表作業。If you assign a to the or property, the class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction. 工作的一部分未開啟當使用者在控制項上按一下滑鼠右鍵。Part of the work the does is opening the when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control. 藉由定義下列屬性和類別。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果其中任何一個屬性上同時設定而，屬性值，從用。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - A自動放在控制項。A is automatically placed inside a control. 無法變更此行為。This behavior cannot be changed. ## 自訂 ContextMenu 控制項Customizing the ContextMenu Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [ContextMenu 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立操縱文字。The following example creates a that manipulates the text of a . 此範例示範如何訂閱和處理的事件中的物件。The example demonstrates how to subscribe to and handle the events of objects in a . [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#Events](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#events)] [!code-csharp[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須設為為要用的回呼委派。The property must be set to for the callback delegate to be used. 委派會傳回的可能點定義相對於陣列。The delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the . 點的操作功能表顯示時，會選擇，達到最大數量是可見的視窗。When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the window that is visible. 因為它是快顯視窗的行為都是相同的。The behavior is the same as it is for the popup. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 指定自訂 Popup 的位置](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-specify-a-custom-popup-position.md)並[快顯位置範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032)。For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-specify-a-custom-popup-position.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以放置splittunneling ， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 這些屬性的行為相同一樣。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示法值。String representation of a value. 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 執行個體的值`1`是可以接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同套用屬性值一節中所述的範圍限制。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，如上所述，後面接著一個的下列單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **附註**在許多情況下雙精度浮點數可能會設定為自動，但如果位移設定為 Auto，將不會出現。**Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性將會讓開啟相對於其按鈕的父代的指定位置。The following example shows how to use the property to cause a to open at a specified location in relation to its button parent. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#ContextMenuProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#contextmenuprops)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以放置splittunneling ， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 這些屬性的行為相同一樣。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示法值。String representation of a value. 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 比方說，值為`1`是可以接受的。For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同套用屬性值一節中所述的範圍限制。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，如上所述，後面接著一個的下列單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > 在許多情況下，雙精度浮點數可能會設定為自動，但是位移會設定為 Auto 不會顯示。In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性將會讓開啟相對於其按鈕的父代的指定位置。The following example shows how to use the property to cause a to open at a specified location in relation to its button parent. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#ContextMenuProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#contextmenuprops)]
